description._content: Image taken from: Title: "A Guide to the Mount's Bay and the Land's End; comprehending the topography, botany, agriculture, fisheries, antiquties, mining, mineralogy and geology of Western Cornwall. Second edition. To which is added ... a dialogue on the peculiar advantages of the climates of Penzance, Devonshire, and the southern parts of Europe. By a Physician [i.e. J. A. Paris]" Contributor: PARIS, John Ayrton. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10368.d.3.", "British Library HMNTS 578.d.38." Page: 64 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1824 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 002906804 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals. If you wish to purchase a high quality copy of the page that this image is drawn from, please order it here.
